#!/bin/bash
# description: Ipe-roxo
# processname: iperoxo
# chkconfig: 2345 91 91

case $1 in
start)
cd /usr/local/iperoxo
./iperoxo.sh Configuracao.properties &
;;
stop)
pkill -f \\-jar\ iperoxo\\-.*\.jar\ Configuracao\.properties
;;
teste)
echo "Teste";;
esac
exit 0

# cp /usr/local/iperoxo/iperoxo-service.txt /etc/init.d/iperoxo
# chmod 755 /etc/init.d/iperoxo

# chkconfig --add iperoxo
# chkconfig --level 2345 iperoxo on

# systemctl start iperoxo
# service iperoxo start
